author: mightypenguin
content:
Not to beat on the gas increase topic too much more, but instead of trying to push through big increases, one at a time, I would advocate for some more gradual increase target per year that increases monotonically.
That way way maybe we can avoid some of the pressure to have specific EIPs every year or multiple times per year related to increasing the gas limit.
It also gives validators a good way to plan for hardware needs years into the future.
I believe we will need to scale via technology improvements (rollups, sharding etc) AND by capacity increases to things like the gas limit.

author: mightypenguin
content: Even baking in a 3% increase per year to the gas limit might make most of these conversations go away.
